ca.proj.game.level.tiles
Class BasicSolidTile

java.lang.Object
  ca.proj.game.level.tiles.Tile
      ca.proj.game.level.tiles.BasicTile
          ca.proj.game.level.tiles.BasicSolidTile

public class BasicSolidTile
extends BasicTile

BasicSolidTile.java is a blocked tile that the character cannot walk on. Constructor Detail

BasicSolidTile

public BasicSolidTile(int id,
                      int x,
                      int y,
                      int tileColour,
                      int levelColour)
Creates a new basic solid tile.

Parameters:
id - the id of the tile
x - the x coordinate of the tile on the level
y - the y coordinate of the tile on the level
tileColour - the colour of the tile
levelColour - the color of the corresponding pixel on a level's image
